name: rotexsoft/gdao
description: A package containing abstract class definitions that can be used as a basis for a Table Data Gateway-ish (http://bit.ly/1F8Zjfc) implementation of a DB access library that performs data manipulation (DM) tasks.

suggest.rotexsoft/leanorm: A Concrete Implementation of the Abstract Classes in rotexsoft/gdao based on a stripped down version of idiorm (\LeanOrm\DBConnector). Light weight data access library.
